messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Cult uniform/leg hair
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/06/2003 13:07:02 Pacific Daylight Time, ... That is pretty funny. One of my son s friend s said to me Nancy, why do you have man legs? I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/06/2003 13:07:02 Pacific Daylight Time,
jmcseals@... writes:


> Jennifer....NEEDING a car to go buy a razor because I haven't shaved my
> legs
> in months and they are really starting to feel GROSS! I can feel the hair
> blowing in the fan-wind. Eww!
>
>

That is pretty funny. One of my son's friend's said to me"Nancy, why do you
have man legs?" I believe that I shaved them the very next day. Up here in
northern BC, we need leg hair for warmth.<BWG>
Nancy in BC with clean shaven legs and no denim jumper dammit


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
